name: Freeman PSSCP Pneumatic 3" Single Pin Concrete Nailer with Case
short_description: Construction Applications: Fasten wood, steel, or other thin metal to concrete walls, cement blocks, and poured concrete slabs fast and easy. Designed for heavy duty jobs such as basement renovations, garage updates, framing, plywood to concrete nailing, wire lathe installation, steel banding, decking, fencing, and subfloors.
Compatible Nails: Single concrete pins from 3/4" – 3" and 0.145" diameter, including Ramset and Hilti
Built to Last: One piece hardened steel drive blade results in a durable pneumatic tool resistant to damage
10 Times Faster than Powder-Actuated Systems: Works with conventional air compressors, hoses and fittings. No powder or certifications required, and no need to pre-drill holes.
Ergonomic Body: Rugged but also lightweight and comfortable for extended use
Comfort Grip Handle: Reduces fatigue during long shifts and increases accuracy of fastener placement
360 Degree Adjustable Exhaust: Conveniently allows user to direct air away from face
For Best Results: Work with green concrete poured less than 25 days prior
Included: Blow molded case

name: BOSTITCH Brad Nailer 18 Gauge/Narrow Crown Stapler, 2-in-1 (SB-2IN1)
short_description: Electric brad nailer drives both 18-gauge brads and narrow crown finish staples for ultimate versatility
Adjustable depth guide of 18 gauge brad nailer sets nails to desired depths quickly and conveniently
Tool-free adjustable exhaust conveniently directs exhaust away from the user
Kit includes: Nailer, 1/4-inch Air Fitting, Carrying Case, Extra No-Mar Tip and Oil
product_description: This 18 GA 2-in-1 Brad Nailer/Finish Stapler Kit is versatile and convenient with its ability to drive both brads and narrow crown finish staples to your desired depth. Use this kit for interior and exterior finish and trim, furniture, cabinet work, and more.

name: WEN 61722K 18-Gauge 2-in-1 Pneumatic 2-Inch Brad Nailer and 1/4-Inch Crown Stapler
short_description: Shoot 18-gauge brads ranging from 5/8 to 2 inches long
Fire 1/4-inch crown staples ranging from 5/8 to 1-5/8 inches long
Features a depth adjustment wheel, a fastener gauge, a rotating exhaust, a 1/4-inch 18 NPT air inlet, and a quick release 100-fastener capacity magazine
Hassle-free nose latch makes clearing jammed fasteners quick and easy
Includes a hard-shelled blow mold carrying case for easy transportation and storage
product_description: Remember when your nailer was a stapler? Or maybe you prefer your stapler to be a nailer? Either way you look at it, I didn’t get much sleep last night. The WEN 18-Gauge 2-Inch 2-in-1 Pneumatic Brad Nailer and Stapler offers versatility and reliability all in one compact design. Shoot 18-gauge 1/4-inch crown staples ranging from 5/8 to 1-5/8 inches in length or 18-gauge brads ranging from 5/8 to 2 inches long. The spring-loaded magazine makes for quick and easy reloads with enough space to hold up to 100 fasteners. The lightweight body combined with the rubber-lined handle limit fatigue during long days on the job. Operating pressure ranges from 60 to 100 PSI with the nailer consuming 0.5 CFM of air per magazine at 80 PSI. The 1/4-inch 18 NPT air inlet allows for quick connection to your favorite air compressor. Adjust the firing depth with a simple turn of the depth adjustment wheel and easily check the remaining fasteners through the gauge window on the side of the magazine. The adjustable air exhaust lets users exhaust air in any direction, while the powder-coated finish prevents wear and tear to the nailer’s body. This package also includes a blow mold carrying case for easy transportation and storage. And, because its a WEN product, your 2-in-1 nailer comes backed by a two-year warranty and a friendly customer help line. Remember when your brad nailer could shoot staples? Remember WEN.

name: Metabo HPT Framing Nailer, Pro-Preferred Power Nailer for Flooring, Roof Decking, and More, Lightweight 7.5 lbs Framing Tool for 21° 2" to 3-1/2" Plastic Collated Nails, NR90AES1
short_description: NAILER: 21 degree plastic collated framing nailer
APPLICATIONS: Great for flooring and framing, truss build-up, window build-up, sub flooring, roof decking, wall sheathing and housing construction
LIGHTWEIGHT: At only 7. 5 lbs and well-balanced allowing for ease of maneuverability and less user fatigue
SELECTIVE ACTUATION: Allows for quick changes between sequential and contact nailing with the flip of a switch
TOOL-LESS DEPTH ADJUSTMENT: Depth adjustment to countersink or flush drive into a variety of materials
FASTENERS: Accepts 2-in up to 3-1/2-in plastic collated framing nails
AWARD: Rated the Pro Preferred Nailer for 7 years running (2014 - 2020) by Builder and Developer Magazine
WARRANTY: Covered by Metabo HPT's Professional 5-Year Tool Warranty
COMPLIANT: Safety standards for pneumatic nailers in the United States
product_description: The NR90AES1 framing nailer drives plastic collated nails from 2" up to 3-1/2" in length and features Metabo HPT's next generation "industrial design." Weighing only 7. 5 lbs, this framing nailer is easy to use all day, while still providing the power similar to other bulkier and heavier framing nailers. The NR90AES1 framing nailer is great for flooring and framing, truss build-up, window build-up, sub flooring, roof decking, wall sheathing and housing construction. The redesigned head guard of the NR90AES1 framing nailer allows for a faster and easier disassembly process, saving valuable time during tool main10ance.

name: Arrow PT23G 23 Gauge Compact Pneumatic Pin Nail Gun, Oil-Free, Fits 3/8”, 1/2”, 5/8”, 13/16” and 1” Nails
short_description: READY FOR ACTION: This power nailer is great for trim jobs, molding work, crafts, and hobby tasks that use headless pin nails; A lightweight compact design, overmold rubber grip, and exhaust cover that allows you to direct exiting air flow add comfort

CONVENIENCE AND FLEXIBILITY: Easy side-load magazine makes loading nails and clearing any jams a breeze, reducing project frustration and down time; This pinner works best with Arrow 23G pin nails that measure 3/8”, 1/2”, 5/8”, 13/16” and 1”

HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: The lightweight die-cast aluminum construction increases durability and reduces strain during use; Unlike other pneumatic tools, the PT23G does not require oil for maintenance
SAFETY FEATURES: The safety trigger feature requires a two-step action, disengage safety, and pull trigger before firing to prevent misfires; Finger should be off the trigger until ready to wet fire
COMPRESSOR COMPATIBILITY: This nail gun comes with air inlet fittings and operates on home compressor units up to 100psi; Ensure nail gun has correct/consistent air pressure
product_description: Arrow's PT23G pneumatic brad nailer is the perfect companion for most small trim and interior molding work. Made of lightweight die-cast aluminum it's easy to handle yet durable enough for heavy duty use. Pin nails are less noticable after painting compared to brad nails.

name: Metabo HPT Coil Framing Nailer | Pro Preferred Brand of Pneumatic Nailers | 15 Degree Magazine | Accepts 2-Inch up to 3-1/4-Inch Nails | Ideal for Wall Sheathing, Roof Decking, & Subflooring | NV83A5
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT: Only 8.8 lbs (or 9.1 lbs if the rafter hook is installed) lightweight and well balanced for easy maneuverability
POWER AND SPEED: Cylinder valve drive mechanism provides quick response and rapid, powerful driving
AWARD: Rated the Pro Preferred Nailer for 9 years running (2014 - 2022) by Builder and Developer Magazine
APPLICATIONS: For wall sheathing, roof decking, subflooring, packing and crating work, and more
SELECTIVE ACTUATION: Selectable trigger mode; choose contact or single sequential actuation mode via switch in the trigger
FASTENERS: Accepts 15° +/- 1 wire coil nails from 2-IN - 3-1/4-IN
HARDENED CLAW TIP: Resists wear on the nose and minimizes slippage when driving at an angle or toe-nailing
QUICK RELOAD: Side load pop-out magazine for fast and easy reloads
RAFTER HOOK: Can be positioned on left or right side depending on user preference
product_description: The NV83A5 Round Head Coil Framing Nailer is used for construction work such as wall sheathing, roof decking, subflooring, mobile and modular home construction, making of wooden boxes, pallets and drums, packing operations in manufacturing plants, and for other types of general packing and crating work. The NV83A5 is like the original NV83A that you have come to trust, but now with an improved trigger design and sharing all the same internal parts as the original NV83A. The NV83A5 relies on the same cylinder valve drive system as the NV83A, which offers both rapid response and great driving power.

name: WORKPRO Pneumatic Brad Nailer, 18 GA, 2 in 1 Nail Gun and Crown Stapler, with 400pcs Nails/ 300pcs Staples, for Carpentry, DIY Project, Woodworking
short_description: Professional Nail Gun: The brad nailer is air-powered, which needs to be connected to an air compressor (NOT INCLUDED). It's much more efficient than manual tools. Pressure: 60 ~ 100 PSI. Air inlet: 1/4 NPT

2 IN 1 Nail/Staple Gun: This practical multi-functional nail/staple gun, is compatible with 18 gauge brad nails and 18 gauge staples. Including 400pcs brad nails/ 300pcs staples. Staples length: 5/8”-1-9/16” (16 mm-40 mm); Nail length: 5/8”-2” (15 mm-50 mm)
Depth Adjustable: Rotating the depth control wheel could adjust the depth of nails/staples. Firing depth adjustment helps protect the work surface and is suitable for various materials

Great Design: 360-degree adjustable exhaust, quick and tool-free jam cleaning, continuously shot mode, a great tool for your upholstery and woodworking. Note: Add oil regularly is needed for all air tools (lubricant included)
Multipurpose: Ideal for upholstery, woodworking, flooring, roofing, molding, door and window installation, etc. Meets you all needs of your family DIY

name: Metabo HPT Framing Nailer, Pro-Preferred Framing Tool For Flooring, Truss Build-Up, Roof Decking, and Housing Construction, Quick Switch Nailing, 3-1/2" 30° Paper Collated Nails, NR90ADS1
short_description: FRAMING NAILER APPLICATIONS: The NR90ADS1 framing nailer features Metabo HPT's next generation industrial design. This power nailer is great for framing. flooring, truss build-up, window build-up, sub flooring, roof decking, wall sheathing and housing construction.

LIGHTWEIGHT POWER NAILER: Metabo HPT's pneumatic framing nailer is lightweight, at only 7 lbs, while still providing the power of a bulkier, heavier nailer. This well-balanced power tool's design allows for ease of maneuverability and less user fatigue, so you can go all day.

SELECTIVE ACTUATION: This framing nailer includes selective actuation which allows for quick changes between sequential and contact nailing with the flip of a switch. This power nailer is perfect for any professional or DIY job.

FASTENERS & 30-DEGREE MAGAZINE: Our framing nailer accepts 2" up to 3-1/2" paper collated clipped and offset round head framing nails. It is recommended that Metabo HPT Nails are used to achieve the best results with this framing nailer. Our framing nailer includes a 30 degree magazine to facilitate operations in tight corners.

TOOL-LESS DEPTH ADJUSTMENT: Our Metabo HPT power nailer has a depth adjuster to countersink or drive fasteners flush into various materials. This framing nailer's head guard design allows for quicker disassembly for maintenance of your power tool.

CHOOSE THE METABO HPT EXPERIENCE: This penumatic framing nailer comes with the Metabo HPT 5-year warranty. Metabo HPT has been rated Pro Preferred for Nailers for 10 years running (2014 - 2023) by Builder and Developer Magazine. Choose the durable Japanese-engineered framing tool to carry out all your professional-grade work; choose the powerful partner of professionals and DIY enthusiasts for over 70 years.

name: ARROW Pneumatic 16 Gauge Finish Nailer with 1000 Pcs Nails, 16 GA Professional Straight Nail Gun Kit, Oil-free Design, Depth Adjustable, Dryfire-lockout, Fits 1-1/4-Inch to 2-1/2-Inch Finish Nails
short_description: Ready Made: Arrow PT16G Pneumatic Straight Finish Nailer Kit includes a PT16G heavy-duty nailer, 1000 pcs 2” 16 gauge finish nails, 2 wrenches (3mm, 4mm). The nail size suitable for this nailer is: 16 gauge straight finish nails from 1-1/4" to 2-1/2". Operating air pressure range is 70-110Psi

Powerful: This pneumatic nail gun has a huge air chamber capacity, which ensures sufficient driving force for nailing, and is capable of heavy-duty work. Adopting the aluminum casting body reduces the overall weight of the product, ensures the durability and firmness of the product, and can withstand greater driving force

Safe Design: This finish nail gun not only ensures strength but also ensures safety during use. The dryfire-lockout design ensures the nailer can't fire when there are only 3-4 nails left, prolonging the life of the nail gun and protecting the user and the working surface. The contact safety device prevents the nail gun from firing by mistake. The adjustable exhaust cover protects the hand's safety, adjusting the air outlet away from the hand

Professional Grade Lifespan: The Arrow PT16G Nailer has professional-grade longevity, so if you're looking for a professional nailer, you can't go wrong with it. The oil-free design of the gun body can effectively reduce friction and heat generated by the air intake, with no need to oil the nailer, prolonging the service life of the product. The quick-release structure can quickly clear the blockage and ensure the service life

Wild Application: The adjustable depth design makes this heavy-duty nailer suitable for various working scenarios, especially for scenes that require high strength, such as some common house repairs, insulation materials, roofing felt, house wrapping materials, automobiles, boats Vinyl trim, cabinet backs, and more

name: Metabo HPT Roofing Nailer, Pro-preferred Pneumatic Power Nailers, Ideal for Asphalt Roofing Shingles, 16 Degree 7/8″ to 1-3/4″ Roofing Nails, NV45AB2
short_description: POWERFUL AND EFFICIENT: This heavy-duty pneumatic roofing nailer drives up to 3 nails per second, ideal to install asphalt roofing shingles, insulation boards, and other materials. The power nailer operates between 70-120 PSI for consistent results.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: The tool-less depth of drive adjustment allows for precision nailing and flush driving. The Metabo HPT roofing nailer includes an easy to load 16 degree magazine with 120 nails capacity. It accepts 7/8" to 1-3/4" Roofing Nails.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND CONVENIENT: This powerful nailer weights only 5.7 lbs and includes a well balanced body making it easy to maneuver. Its side-loading magazine for quick nail replenishment and quick driving system reduce downtime and maximize efficiency.

UNMATCHED RELIABILITY AND DURABILITY: The Metabo HPT pneumatic roofing nailer features a pneumatic power feed and return system allowing you can cover wide surfaces quickly with minimal replenishing time, even in the harshest conditions.

PRO-PREFERRED BRAND OF NAILERS FOR 11 YEARS IN A ROW: This power nailer comes with the Metabo HPT 5-year warranty. Choose our durable Japanese-engineered roofing tool to carry out all your professional-grade work, get more at the Metabo HPT store.
